extension.name: EB Registration History
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is used to show Registration History of a user in his JomSocial Profile

field.name: coreapp
field.label: Core Application
field.description: Causes this application to not appearin the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin
